name: The Voice from Heaven
description: A charming match3 game! Help Aurora heal the sick king with her magical voice and remove the curse from the kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
